index.subtitle: Revive the evenings of cooperative games

remote-controller-is-a-free-and-open-sou: LibreRemotePlay is a free and open source app that lets you play local co-op games online with your friends, without having to use Steam or any other proprietary gaming online services. It just works, it’s like you’re both playing on the same computer!
what-is-remote-controller-content: LibreRemotePlay is a free and open source app that lets you play local co-op games online with your friends, without having to use Steam or any other proprietary gaming online services. It just works, it’s like you’re both playing on the same computer!
how-does-it-work-content: LibreRemotePlay uses a peer-to-peer connection, so you don’t have to worry about your data being compromised. It also has low latency, so you can play games that require quick reflexes.
how-do-i-get-started-content: Just follow the steps of the guides to download and install the app to start playing. But the App itself also has interactive tutorials

head.title-secondary: Play local co-op games online with your FRIENDS

feature.play-any-game-content: LibreRemotePlay works with any game that supports controllers even if it's DRM Free. Just launch the game, and LibreRemotePlay will take care of the rest.
feature.low-latency-content: Thanks to the peer-to-peer connection, LibreRemotePlay has low latency, so you can play games that require quick reflexes.
feature.p2p-connection-content: We use a peer-to-peer connection, so you don’t have to worry about your data being compromised.
feature.no-account-required-content: You don’t need to create an account to use LibreRemotePlay. Just follow the steps to download and install the app to start playing.
feature.free-and-open-source-content: LibreRemotePlay is free and open source. You can check out the source code on GitHub.
feature.share-your-video-and-audio-content: You can enjoy your games with high quality video and audio streaming

os-support-description: We got you covered! LibreRemotePlay supports Windows, and Linux.
os-support-browser: Also we have a browser client for those who don't want to install anything, it works in almost every browser.
card-description: No account, no credit card required.
gamelinksafe-description: Safely Connect Your LAN Games. The ultimate solution for gamers who want to play together.
